id: The Best Changing Tables on Amazon, According to Hyperenthusiastic Reviewers
paragraph: Here at the Strategist, we like to think of ourselves as crazy (in the good way) about the stuff we buy, but as much as we’d like to, we can’t try everything. Which is why we have People’s Choice, in which we find the best-reviewed (that’s four-to-five-star reviews and lots of’ ’em) products and single out the most convincing. While we’ve written before about the best changing pads, diaper caddies, and cribs, here we’re investigating the best changing tables on Amazon. (Note that reviews have been edited for length and clarity.)“Bought this beautiful changing table for my child’s nursery, and we absolutely love it! The white color matches any nursery décor, and it is extremely well-made and sturdy for the price point. I love the two shelves underneath to store diapers and various creams and toys. The table was very easy to assemble, and my husband had it done in about 20 minutes.”“Absolutely love this changing table. I have been using it now for four months and couldn’t be any happier with my decision to buy it, after searching a zillion changing tables! It’s the perfect size, and the storage underneath is great! Can’t recommend enough!”“This is a great changing station for a little one and is a great relief for your lower back, rather than bending over into a bassinet, crib, or bed while changing. The table has great storage underneath as well. Our child is 5 months and already at 27 inches, and is getting close to being too long to be changed in it. I would recommend this changing table for 0 to 6 months, depending on how long your child is!”“As a mama expecting her ninth baby, I’ve owned a few changing tables over the years. This past year, we weren’t expecting to get pregnant and had given away all of our baby things right before moving across the country. That led me to this changing table, which I LOVE! For one, it’s insanely cheap! It was easy to put together. It’s made really well, and it looks good. If you’re looking for an inexpensive changing table, you should take a chance on this one!”“I LOVE this Playard! We put this in our living room for our newborn to nap in during the day. The vibrating bassinet is very soothing and helps her sleep longer. I love the four shelves beneath the bassinet and changing station. When she outgrows the bassinet and changer I like the option to keep the height of the Playard higher to make lifting her in and out easier. The Playard is also very light and easy to collapse and carry.”“This was lighter than I thought, but that made the entire assembly easy. The finish was UNBLEMISHED!! It is also convertible, yes. And by that I guess they mean that you simply remove the side of the crib and ‘booyah!’ toddler bed!! There is no rail or anything else to add to convert it. It has three mattress levels, and the highest one is perfect for a baby who does not sit up yet.”“Heavy duty, quality material, easy installation, easy use, great for commercial use, even has ADA-compliant installation instructions.”“I purchased this changing table for my infant’s room. It was super easy to install. I love, love, love that it takes up no floor space. Super easy to fold down, and put back up after changing my baby. It even looks nice on the wall. This is a great product.”The Strategist is designed to surface the most useful, expert recommendations for things to buy across the vast e-commerce landscape. Some of our latest conquests include the best acne treatments, rolling luggage, pillows for side sleepers, natural anxiety remedies, and bath towels.
